sn4.13:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati maddakucchismim migadaye.
sn4.13:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pado sakalikaya khato hoti,
sn4.13:1.4: bhusa sudam bhagavato vedana vattanti saririka dukkha tibba khara katuka asata amanapa.
sn4.13:1.5: Ta sudam bhagava sato sampajano adhivaseti avihannamano.
sn4.13:1.6: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano.
sn4.13:1.7: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.13:2.2: Attha nu te sampacura na santi;
sn4.13:5.1: Jaggam na sanke napi bhemi sottum,
sn4.13:6.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
